item.title: Hugo with GH actions
item.description: My newbie GH Action setup for updating my website

item.title: BBQ baked beans in an Instant Pot
item.description: I used BBQ sauce to season beans and then cooked them for a few hours. With the BBQ sauce they take a longer time to cook. The results are very tasty.

item.title: Strange photos of playing cats
item.description: I went through old cat photos and found sound funny ones.

item.title: Food
item.description: If I’m having a hard time preparing a dish, I’ll take notes and photos to try and understand it all better.

item.title: Electronics
item.description: I sometimes like to play with electronics.

item.title: Cats
item.description: Welcome to my blog about our two cats: angry-fluff and long-cat.

item.title: Eating habits of cats
item.description: My cats have a system for sharing food with one another. One also developed a way of telling us it’s finished eating. Here’s a short video showing all of these things.

item.title: The magic of bread
item.description: I baked bread from frozen dough twice. I’ve recording both. The results are not perfect but still tasty.

item.title: Weevils in my beans
item.description: A few bags of pinto beans had bugs in them. I try to identify the bugs, mostly to make sure the beans are the source.
